resources.string: You are playing a sudoku solving puzzle game. Enter values between 1 and 9 into the grid. Some fields have already a fixed value in them. These fields have different color. You can not modify these values. Repetition of values is not allowed in any of the rows or columns of the grid. Also no repetition is allowed in any of the 3x3 squares highlighted by stiffer grid lines. The goal is to fill every empty field. If you find solving the puzzle too hard, you can take hints from the solver or you can let the program to fully finish it. Have fun solving!
